alvar::Point

Point< C, D > Struct Template Reference

Simple Point class meant to be inherited from OpenCV point-classes. For example: Point<CvPoint2D64f> p. More...

Detailed Description

template<class C, class D = int>
struct alvar::Point< C, D >

Simple Point class meant to be inherited from OpenCV point-classes. For example: Point<CvPoint2D64f> p.
